com.sanquan.boardcomm

Class DoorAccessCommManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sanquan.boardcomm.BaseCommManager
      • com.sanquan.boardcomm.DoorAccessCommManager

  • public class DoorAccessCommManager
extends BaseCommManager
    The communication manager of android main board and MCU board , responsible for sending commands to the MCU board and receiving callback from MCU.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DoorAccessCommManager.OnBoardCommReceiveListener
      Callback will be triggered while android board receiving message from MCU board.

        public static final int KEYCODE_INFRARED_ON
        The human body Infrared detection interrupt value, when the human body action is detected, Android Activity OnKeyDown callback is called and receive this key code, It will stop sending the key code when the person is not detected

        Setup an organization key

        orgbytes - byte[4]

      • setOnBoardCommRequest

        public void setOnBoardCommRequest(DoorAccessCommManager.OnBoardCommReceiveListener listener)
        Setup MCU board message callback for manager
        Parameters:
        listener - message listener

      • sendOpenCommand

        public void sendOpenCommand(byte[] cardId,
                            byte accessMode)
        Send unlock command to MCU board. Door would close automatically while pull time out.
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id
        accessMode - unlock mode

      • sendKeyUpdateCommand

        public void sendKeyUpdateCommand(byte[] cardId,
                                 byte[] startDateTime,
                                 byte[] endDateTime,
                                 byte[] curDateTime,
                                 byte[] phoneNum,
                                 byte[] serialNum,
                                 byte[] doorId,
                                 byte operation)
        Send IC card updating command to MCU board if need store IC card id on MCU board,
        Parameters:
        cardId - byte[8] card id
        startDateTime - byte[5] start time
        endDateTime - byte[5] end time
        curDateTime - byte[5] current time
        phoneNum - byte[5] phone number
        serialNum - byte[2] card store index
        doorId - byte[6] door number
        operation - operation type: 1-- clear all,2--add card,3-- finish updating,4--delete card ,5--modify card

      • sendRelayPullTime

        public void sendRelayPullTime(byte[] cardId,
                              byte pullTime)
        Setup MCU relay pull time.
        Parameters:
        cardId - byte[8] card id
        pullTime - byte relay time, 1s to 10s unit:second

      • sendLongOpenCommand

        public void sendLongOpenCommand(byte[] cardId,
                                byte accessMode)
        Send manual unlock command to MCU board. You need call sendCloseCommand function to lock the door.
        Parameters:
        cardId - byte[8], Card id
        accessMode - byte, Access mode: 1--ic card,2-remote phone,3-password,4-manual,5-wifi, 6-face,7-fingerprint

      • sendCloseCommand

        public void sendCloseCommand(byte[] cardId,
                             byte accessMode)
        Send lock command to MCU board.
        Parameters:
        cardId - byte[8] Card ID
        accessMode - byte Access mode

      • sendWatchogCommand

        public void sendWatchogCommand(byte[] cardId,
                               byte operation)
        Android board send watchdog command to MCU board
        Parameters:
        cardId - byte[8] Card id
        operation - byte , operation mode: 1--power off,2--open mcu watchdog, 3--close mcu watchdog

      • sendDataToComm

        public void sendDataToComm(byte ttyName,
                           byte[] data)
        Send transparent data to mcu serial port
        Parameters:
        ttyName - MCU serial port device name
        data -

      • setCommBaudrate

        public void setCommBaudrate(byte ttyName,
                            int baudrate)
        Setup MCU serial port baud rate
        Parameters:
        ttyName - Serial port device name,ttyS1 or ttyS3
        baudrate - Baud rate

      • setMCUPowerOnOff

        public void setMCUPowerOnOff(byte operation,
                             byte group,
                             byte[] onTime,
                             byte[] offTime)
        Setup mcu power timing switches
        Parameters:
        operation - 1--add，2 --delete
        group - group index,1 to 7
        onTime - mcu power on time.date time value: 18 7 10 9 37 represent 2018/07/10 09：37
        offTime - mcu power off time.

      • upgradeMCU

        public void upgradeMCU(short version,
                       java.lang.String binFilePath)
        Start to upgrade mcu firmware
        Parameters:
        version - bin file version
        binFilePath - bin file path
